customPrimary: Gravitic effects slow and push target off-course. The effect is minor and is most noticeable vs fighters and missiles.

name: Heavy Burst Laser
customPrimary: Advanced built-in targeting sensors enable the weapon to identify decoy flares and not fire on them.

name: Ion Pulser
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor have a %s chance to arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra damage equal to the original hit.

name: Ion Beam
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor periodically arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.

name: Paladin PD System
customPrimary: When all sub-beams impact a target in close proximity to each other, the spalling effect produces an explosion that deals up to 100 points of fragmentation damage to other nearby targets.

name: Tachyon Lance
tags: energy20, beam15, LR, rare_bp, hist1t, merc
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor frequently arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.

name: Shock Repeater
customPrimary: Fires an EMP arc at the nearest target close to the weapon's current facing. The arc always hits.

name: Rift Beam
customPrimary: Creates space-time rifts along the beam length, targeted at nearby enemy missiles and fighters. Each rift deals up to %s energy damage to nearby targets.

name: Disintegrator
customPrimary: Each shot deals an additional 500 damage to armor over 20 seconds. This damage is not reduced by armor.

name: Rift Cascade Emitter
customPrimary: Creates space-time rifts on impact. More rifts are spawned when the beam is fired at short range. Each rift deals between %s and %s energy damage to nearby targets, with successive rifts dealing more damage.

name: Volatile Particle Driver
customPrimary: Shots may lose cohesion and dissolve. %s of the shots reach half the maximum range and %s of the shots reach full range.

name: Reality Disruptor
customPrimary: Projectile fires EMP arcs at nearby enemy targets while traveling. The damage shown is for the EMP arcs, the projectile itself does not deal damage and will pass over ships.
